5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649676.name: Elastic Slingshot
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649676.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649676.tooltip:
Charges up and launches towards a target area, knocking up enemies.
Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating the ability launches him towards his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and knocking them back for {{ e5 }} second.

In addition, Zac will spawn extra chunks if he hits multiple enemy champions.

Can be cancelled by moving, refunding half of the ability's cooldown and cost.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966c.name: Dragon Strike
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966c.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966c.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c9649608.name: Rend
5a0eb1df8bf55039c9649608.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c9649608.tooltip:
Passive: Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.

Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset and its mana cost is refunded.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649493.name: Death Sentence
5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649493.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649493.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c9.name: Chronoshift
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c9.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c9.tooltip: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, arriving with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649536.name: Majestic Roar
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649536.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649536.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964953a.name: Permafrost
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964953a.description: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages and slows all nearby enemies with Frost.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964953a.tooltip:
Passive: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds.

Active: All nearby enemies with Frost take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961c.name: Soul Shackles
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961c.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961c.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting True Sight. After {{ e3 }} seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961e.name: Shroud of Darkness
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961e.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961e.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956c.name: Timewinder
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956c.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956c.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495ec.name: Ice Blast
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495ec.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495ec.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649553.name: Tremors
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649553.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649553.tooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649669.name: Spirit's Refuge
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649669.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649669.tooltip:
Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for {{ e1 }} seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or {{ e2 }} seconds pass.

5a0eb1da8bf55039c964947e.name: Rapid Fire
5a0eb1da8bf55039c964947e.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c964947e.tooltip: Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b9.name: Bullet Time
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b9.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b9.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ f3 }}% damage.

Total Damage: {{ f2 }}

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649597.name: Fox-Fire
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649597.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649597.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ff.name: Toxic Shot
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ff.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ff.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649524.name: Leap of Faith
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649524.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649524.tooltip:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.

For the next {{ e1 }} seconds Tentacles are untargetable and will Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.

'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494d4.name: Playful / Trickster
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494d4.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494d4.tooltip:
Fizz hops on his trident towards the cursor, becoming briefly untargetable.

Reactivation: Fizz cancels the spell early, jumping towards the cursor a second time and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

If Fizz does not reactivate, he deals damage in a larger area and slows all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649598.name: Charm
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649598.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649598.tooltip: Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649480.name: Explosive Charge
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649480.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649480.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret that explodes after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. Each attack and ability charges the bomb's damage by +{{ e6 }}%.

At 4 charges, the bomb explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649625.name: Starsurge
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649625.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649625.tooltip:
First Press: Aurelion Sol creates a new stellar core, which grows over time and grants him {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

The core will detonate when it reaches his Outer Limit, applying {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and a {{ e4 }} second stun.

Second Press: Detonate the core early.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964952d.name: Three Talon Strike
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964952d.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964952d.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964956b.name: Behind Enemy Lines
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964956b.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964956b.tooltip:
Quinn calls down Valor to assist her. After a 2 second channel, they unite, gaining {{ e3 }}% Total Movement Speed and the ability to cast Skystrike by recasting this ability or taking offensive action. Skystrike damages nearby enemies.

Taking champion or turret damage puts Behind Enemy Lines on a 3 second cooldown.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964958d.name: Rite of the Arcane
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964958d.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964958d.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If no barrages are fired, {{ e7 }}% of the cooldown is refunded.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649589.name: Event Horizon
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649589.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649589.tooltip: After a {{ e2 }} second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649584.name: Stand Behind Me
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649584.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649584.tooltip:
Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ee.name: Heartseeker Strike
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ee.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ee.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495be.name: Lay Waste
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495be.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495be.tooltip:
Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy.

If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649583.name: Winter's Bite
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649583.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649583.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649522.name: Harsh Lesson
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649522.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649522.tooltip:
Illaoi leaps at her target on her next basic attack, dealing bonus physical damage equal to {{ f1 }}% of their maximum health [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2 }}% per 100 attack damage].

When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will Slam at the target.

Harsh Lesson's bonus damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649640.name: Command: Attack
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649640.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649640.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649479.name: Grandmaster's Might
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649479.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649479.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional Magic Damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e6 }}% bonus Attack Damage.
Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e7 }}% Ability Power.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649575.name: Nevermove
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649575.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649575.tooltip: Swain marks the target area that triggers after a brief delay dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within range and rooting them for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649563.name: Lamb's Respite
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649563.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649563.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649665.name: Crystallize
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649665.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649665.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649642.name: Command: Protect
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649642.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649642.tooltip:
Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959f.name: Crippling Strike
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959f.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959f.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649590.name: Gatling Gun
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649590.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649590.tooltip:
Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) damage and reducing up to {{ e4 }} armor and magic resist.

Gatling Gun's damage is {{ e7 }}% physical, {{ e8 }}% magic.
Defense reductions last for {{ e6 }} seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961a.name: Tormented Soil
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961a.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961a.tooltip:
Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649648.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649648.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Magic Damage and reveals enemies hit.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649648.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for {{ e6 }} seconds.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649494.name: Dark Passage
5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649494.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649494.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649513.name: Feral Scream
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649513.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649513.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} seconds and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649641.name: Command: Dissonance
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649641.description: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649641.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d7.name: Satchel Charge
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d7.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d7.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will hexplode structurally unsound towers below {{ f1 }}% of their Health.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494de.name: Glacial Path
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494de.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494de.tooltip:
Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495f2.name: Cosmic Binding
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495f2.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495f2.tooltip:
Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} second(s).

If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494a7.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494a7.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494a7.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for 4 seconds.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495bc.name: Equinox
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495bc.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495bc.tooltip:
Creates a zone at target location for 1.5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave.

When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for {{ e1 }} second(s) and are dealt {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649595.name: Depth Charge
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649595.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649595.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495ea.name: Consume
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495ea.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495ea.tooltip:
Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Passive - Feed The Yeti: For every Large or Epic Monster Consumed, Nunu gains increased Size, {{ e10 }}% Maximum Health, and {{ e9 }} out of combat Movement Speed for the next {{ f5 }} seconds (max {{ e6 }} stacks).

Recently Consumed monsters will not grant additional bonuses ({{ e5 }} second cooldown).

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649555.name: Void Rift
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649555.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649555.tooltip:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage.

Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649674.name: Stretching Strike
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649674.description: Zac extends his arms, slowing and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649674.tooltip: Smacks enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c964950e.name: Broken Wings
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c964950e.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c964950e.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649578.name: Bastion
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649578.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649578.tooltip:
Taric's spells will also cast from a nearby ally protected by Bastion.

Passive: Bastion increases Armor by {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Blesses an ally with Bastion and shields them for {{ e2 }}% of their maximum Health for {{ e3 }} seconds. Bastion lasts on the target until a new one is chosen.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966b.name: Stand United
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966b.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966b.tooltip: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649631.name: Noxious Blast
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649631.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649631.tooltip:
Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Noxious Poison deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964e.name: Lucent Singularity
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964e.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964e.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649638.name: Fury of the Sands
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649638.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649638.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e4 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) and gains an additional {{ e8 }} Armor and Magic Resistance.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495df.name: Void Spike
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495df.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495df.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit ({{ e5 }}% bonus damage to monsters). Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and slows targets hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for {{ e7 }}% instead.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494fa.name: Trueshot Barrage
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494fa.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494fa.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy it passes through. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each enemy hit (minimum {{ e3 }}%).

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649542.name: Judgment
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649542.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649542.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Enemy champions hit by {{ e6 }} spins lose {{ e5 }}% of their armor for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c964950d.name: Slicing Maelstrom
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c964950d.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c964950d.tooltip:
Summons a magical storm for {{ e3 }} seconds that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every {{ e2 }} seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3.

Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional {{ e4 }}% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954a.name: Shadow Slash
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954a.description: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954a.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are slowed by {{ e3 }}% instead.

5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649487.name: Grand Challenge
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649487.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649487.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on target champion, for a potential {{ f8 }}% max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus ({{ f6 }}%) while near the target.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in {{ e1 }} seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ f9 }}) each second for between {{ e9 }} to {{ e6 }} seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961f.name: Unspeakable Horror
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961f.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961f.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964955b.name: Ace in the Hole
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964955b.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964955b.tooltip:
Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ e2 }} range. The shot deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649667.name: Glacial Storm
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649667.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649667.tooltip:
Toggle: Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that increases in size over {{ e7 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to targets and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

When the Glacial Storm is fully formed, it slows targets' Movement Speed by {{ f1 }}% and does {{ e3 }}% damage instead.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649517.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649517.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649517.tooltip:
Toggle Off: Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health.

Toggle On: Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495fb.name: Brushmaker
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495fb.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495fb.tooltip:
Passive: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush for {{ e1 }} seconds. For 3 seconds the area in and around the brush is revealed.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954b.name: Death Mark
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954b.description: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active. If the Champion dies under Death Mark, Zed can gain a portion of their attack damage.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954b.tooltip:
Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds, the mark triggers, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} + {{ e2 }}% of all damage dealt to the target by Zed while the mark was active.

The dash leaves a shadow behind for {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating Death Mark causes Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Reaper of Shadows: Zed reaps the shadow of the strongest foe slain under Death Mark, gaining {{ f2 }} attack damage. ({{ e10 }} + {{ e9 }}% of the victim's attack damage.)

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649673.name: Nether Grasp
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649673.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649673.tooltip: Malzahar suppresses a target champion for {{ e4 }} seconds and creates a zone of negative energy around it that deals {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of nearby enemies max Health as magic damage per second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649679.name: Drunken Rage
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649679.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649679.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for {{ e5 }} seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of their max Health (max {{ e4 }} vs monsters).

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649579.name: Dazzle
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649579.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649579.tooltip: Readies a beam of starlight that, after {{ e3 }} second, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and stuns enemies for {{ e2 }} second(s).

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f2.name: Assassin's Path
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f2.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f2.tooltip:
Talon vaults up to {{ f2 }} units over the nearest structure or terrain in the target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed.

Talon cannot dash over the same section of terrain more than once every {{ f3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b7.name: Strut
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b7.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b7.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by {{ f2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495ac.name: Cocoon / Rappel
5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495ac.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495ac.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649567.name: Crowstorm
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649567.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649567.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks channels for {{ e3 }} seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

The effect lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total magic damage.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964962d.name: Siphon Power
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964962d.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964962d.tooltip:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while granting Viktor a shield that absorbs up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage over the next {{ e2 }} seconds.

Viktor's next basic attack deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Augment - Turbocharge: Viktor gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964956a.name: Vault
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964956a.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964956a.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage while Valor marks it as Vulnerable.

Upon reaching the target, Quinn leaps off, briefly displacing and slowing it by {{ e1 }}% (diminishing over {{ e3 }} seconds).

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649564.name: Terrify
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649564.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649564.tooltip: Terrifies a target, causing it to flee from Fiddlesticks for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956f.name: Chronobreak
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956f.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956f.tooltip: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964a.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964a.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing increased damage based on her Fury. Deals True Damage at max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964a.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ f1 }} Physical Damage, increasing by up to 100% at maximum Fury. Deals True Damage if Rek'Sai has 100 Fury.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494cd.name: Dominus
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494cd.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494cd.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health and {{ e6 }} Fury. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains {{ e4 }} Fury per second.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956e.name: Phase Dive
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956e.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964956e.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649666.name: Frostbite
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649666.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649666.tooltip:
Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If a target was recently stunned by Anivia or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964955e.name: Pillar of Ice
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964955e.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964955e.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649559.name: Yordle Snap Trap
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649559.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649559.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e1 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c964960e.name: Denting Blows
5a0eb1df8bf55039c964960e.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c964960e.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by {{ e3 }}% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds (max {{ e5 }} damage vs. monsters).

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964f.name: Final Spark
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964f.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964964f.tooltip: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c1.name: Requiem
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c1.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c1.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494bc.name: Stand Aside
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494bc.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494bc.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649594.name: Riptide
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649594.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649594.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494d9.name: Living Artillery
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494d9.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494d9.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) to @Effect1Amount*1.5@ (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage based on their missing health.

If enemies are below 40% health, they take {{ f4 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f5 }}) magic damage instead.

Each subsequent shot within {{ e4 }} seconds costs {{ e3 }} more Mana (max {{ e5 }}).

5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495a9.name: Monsoon
5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495a9.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495a9.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964962e.name: Gravity Field
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964962e.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964962e.tooltip:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemy units by {{ e1 }}% and adding a stack every {{ e4 }} seconds. At {{ e5 }} stacks the target is stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494cc.name: Slice and Dice
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494cc.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494cc.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of {{ e10 }} Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e9 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649546.name: Zenith Blade
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649546.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649546.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959c.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959c.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959c.tooltip: Deals {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health (+{{ a1 }}) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. ({{ e1 }} Maximum Damage against monsters)

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649661.name: Brutal Strikes
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649661.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649661.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f0.name: Noxian Diplomacy
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f0.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f0.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649627.name: Comet of Legend
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649627.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649627.tooltip:
Passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954e.name: Power Fist
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954e.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954e.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c964965d.name: Rune Prison
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964965d.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964965d.tooltip: Instantly root an enemy for {{ e1 }} second and deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494db.name: Twisted Advance
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494db.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies. He regrows near a target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it in place.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494db.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the target's maximum health as magic damage (Max: {{ e3 }} to minions and monsters).

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494ba.name: Spinning Axe
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494ba.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494ba.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e5 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of his bonus Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

5a0eb1da8bf55039c964948d.name: Devour
5a0eb1da8bf55039c964948d.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c964948d.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains {{ e4 }}% movement speed toward enemy champions.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b1.name: Riftwalk
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b1.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b1.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units.

Each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage per stack, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649500.name: Disintegrate
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649500.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649500.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964953f.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964953f.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964953f.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649591.name: Missile Barrage
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649591.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649591.tooltip:
Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} {{ f3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ e8 }}% increased damage.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d6.name: Bouncing Bomb
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d6.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d6.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649580.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649580.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649580.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of his maximum health) (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to {{ e5 }}% over 3 seconds.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649662.name: Ground Slam
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649662.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649662.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f1.name: Rake
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f1.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f1.tooltip:
Talon tosses a volley of blades, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to units hit and returning to him after a delay.

On their way back to Talon, the blades deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage and slow the enemy by {{ e2 }}% for 1 second.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495fd.name: Daisy!
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495fd.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495fd.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy gains additional damage and defenses based on Ivern's Ability Power.

Recasting this ability will direct Daisy to a new target or position.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649592.name: Dredge Line
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649592.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor and the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c9649592.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e8.name: Resolute Smite
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e8.description: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, slowing and dealing damage to enemies caught near the impact point.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e8.tooltip: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954d.name: Overdrive
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954d.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c964954d.tooltip:
Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.

When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b2.name: Boomerang Blade
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b2.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494b2.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target hit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e1.name: Zap!
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e1.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e1.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961d.name: Duskbringer
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961d.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c964961d.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f9.name: Arcane Shift
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f9.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f9.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649621.name: Crescent Strike
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649621.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649621.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495a2.name: Bloodlust
5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495a2.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c96495a2.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ea.name: Righteous Gust
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ea.description: Galio claps his wings, unleashing a gust of concussive wind that damages enemies and leaves a directional draft in its wake that increases ally Movement Speed.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ea.tooltip: Galio unleashes a gust of concussive wind that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path. A directional draft then remains for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing the Movement Speed of allies following it by {{ e2 }}%.

5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494bd.name: Whirling Death
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494bd.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c96494bd.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals {{ e4 }}% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649526.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649526.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649526.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Each rocket deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Units hit multiple times take reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} {{ f2 }} total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Aiming between Heimerdinger and the target increases the rocket spread.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649560.name: Dance of Arrows
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649560.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649560.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649543.name: Demacian Justice
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649543.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
5a0eb1dd8bf55039c9649543.tooltip:
Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional {{ e3 }}% of its maximum health as true damage.

Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f7.name: Mystic Shot
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f7.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494f7.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e2.name: Flame Chompers!
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e2.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494e2.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649628.name: Voice of Light
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649628.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
5a0eb1e08bf55039c9649628.tooltip:
Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ef.name: Grand Skyfall
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ef.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c96494ef.tooltip:
Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a {{ e5 }} second cooldown.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649516.name: Dark Flight
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649516.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649516.tooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.

5a0eb1da8bf55039c964948e.name: Thick Skin
5a0eb1da8bf55039c964948e.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c964948e.tooltip:
Passive: {{ e3 }}% of the Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, {{ e2 }}% of gray health will turn back into health.

Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649486.name: Riposte
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649486.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
5a0eb1da8bf55039c9649486.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next {{ e2 }} seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.

5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649508.name: Shifting Sands
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649508.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.
5a0eb1dc8bf55039c9649508.tooltip:
Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If Azir hits an enemy champion, his dash stops and he gains a shield for {{ e6 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} damage.

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c2.name: Transfusion
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c2.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495c2.tooltip:
Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health. After casting Transfusion twice, Vladimir gains Crimson Rush the next time it becomes available to cast.

Crimson Rush: Vladimir is briefly hasted and for the next {{ e8 }} seconds Transfusion deals {{ e7 }}% increased damage and heals for an additional {{ f7 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f6 }}%) of his missing health (empowered heal has {{ e9 }}% effectiveness against minions).

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964957c.name: Force of Will
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964957c.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964957c.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the grabbed unit. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

This spell can be cast while moving.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649671.name: Void Swarm
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649671.description: Malzahar summons a Voidling. The first time a summoned Voidling attacks a champion or monster, Malzahar summons a new Voidling.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c9649671.tooltip:
Summon a Voidling lasting {{ e1 }} seconds to fight nearby enemies.

If a Voidling has more than {{ f3 }} seconds remaining, its first attack on a champion or monster spawns a new Voidling with the same remaining duration.

Voidlings:
  • Deal {{ f1 }} (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage ({{ e7 }}% damage against monsters)
    Have {{ e10 }}% bonus Movement Speed towards enemies afflicted by Nether Grasp or Malefic Visions
    Deal {{ e6 }}% damage to lane minions affected by Malefic Visions

5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649499.name: Inspire
5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649499.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
5a0eb1db8bf55039c9649499.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, absorbing an additional {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. Nearby allied champions gain shields that absorb {{ f2 }}% as much as the initial target's shield. All champions shielded gain {{ f3 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959e.name: Decimate
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959e.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
5a0eb1de8bf55039c964959e.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d0.name: Flame Breath
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d0.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
5a0eb1df8bf55039c96495d0.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that stops after hitting a champion. All enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are marked for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal {{ e4 }}% of their maximum health as magic damage on hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies on scorched earth take {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage per second.

Flame Breath's on-hit damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c964965e.name: Spell Flux
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964965e.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
5a0eb1e18bf55039c964965e.tooltip:
Apply Flux to an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage. Spells consume Flux for bonus effects:

Overload: Deals {{ e2 }}% more damage and spreads to nearby enemies with Flux.
Rune Prison: Root duration is doubled to {{ e6 }} seconds.
Spell Flux: Spreads Spell Flux to nearby enemies.

Spells that kill enemies affected by Flux spread Spell Flux to nearby enemies.

5a0eb1e18bf55039c964966d.name: Golden Aegis
